title: Can a security guard deal with dogs due to necessity? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: from indonesia security guard deals with k-9 dogs so part of his job is to deal with dogs to sniff drugs and ammunition or arms or whatever is this permissible the answer is yes this is permissible because it's a necessity the rulings remain the saliva and the wetness in the the the nose and the mouth and the tongue of the dog is not just you have to wash it off
